name: Green Green 2: Koi no Special Summer
summary: As the new school year begins in Kanenone Gakuen, so does a new era as it becomes a co-educational school! You are Midorikawa Yutaka, a new first-year student who initially was wary of other students, but as they lived together in the dormitory, they gradually became your friends. Although school life was inconvenient to the point of death, everyone was enjoying it in their own way, until one day... when it was announced its closure! Students were divided and chaos surged between those who wanted the school to stay open and those who wanted it closed. What is the fate of Kanenone Gakuen? And what will happen to Yutaka and his friends' school life and love?
